---
id: delete-default-config
title: "DeleteDefaultConfig"
description: "Permanently removes a default config entry from the workspace. This operation cannot be performed if it affects config resolution for contexts that rely on this fallback value."
sidebar_label: "DeleteDefaultConfig"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"
info_path: docs/api/superposition
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"DeleteDefaultConfig"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/default-config/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently removes a default config entry from the workspace. This operation cannot be performed if it affects config resolution for contexts that rely on this fallback value.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"key","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"juspay"},"required":true},{"name":"x-tenant","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"DeleteDefaultConfig 201 response"},"404":{"description":"ResourceNotFound 404 response"},"500":{"description":"InternalServerError 500 response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"InternalServerErrorResponseContent"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
